content: Collect the completed form copies and data from them into XLSX for analyzing responses in Form Filling rooms.

comment.text: Collect completed form copies and data into XLSX for analysis in Form Filling rooms. This description is used in buttons to initiate file sharing in various UI components such as dialogs, share panels, and share form dialogs.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ملء النماذج" (filling forms) is not the most natural way to describe "Form Filling rooms." A more accurate translation would convey the purpose of the rooms, like "غرف معالجة النماذج" (Form Processing rooms) or "غرف فحص النماذج" (Form Review rooms).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: غرف معالجة النماذج

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Collect" is too literal. A more natural phrasing in Azerbaijani would convey the action of gathering or compiling the data.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Doldurma otaqlarında cavabları təhlil etmək üçün tamamlanmış forma nüsxələrini və onlardan alınan məlumatları bir araya toplayın/kompilə edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'onlardan məlumatları' is a bit clunky. 'Onlardan alınan məlumatları' (the data obtained from them) is more fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Doldurma otaqlarında cavabları təhlil etmək üçün tamamlanmış forma nüsxələrini və onlardan alınan məlumatları bir araya toplayın/kompilə edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Formularausfüllräumen" is not the most natural or idiomatic translation for "Form Filling rooms." It's overly literal and sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more natural phrasing like "Räumen zur Bearbeitung von Formularen" or simply "Bearbeitungsräume" if the context makes it clear what kind of rooms are being referred to.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "salas para rellenar formularios" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Form Filling rooms". It literally translates to "rooms for filling out forms". A more suitable translation would convey the intended meaning of a dedicated space for analyzing form responses.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "salas de análisis de formularios" or "salas de revisión de formularios" which more accurately describe the function of the rooms.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "lomakkeiden täyttöhuoneissa" is a bit wordy and could be more concise. While grammatically correct, it makes the sentence slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kerää täytetyt lomakekopiot ja tiedot niistä XLSX-tiedostoon vastausten analysoimiseksi täyttöhuoneissa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "salles de remplissage de formulaires" is an awkward and less natural way to express "Form Filling rooms". A more common and understandable translation would be "salles de saisie de formulaires" or "pièces de remplissage de formulaires".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "salles de saisie de formulaires" or "pièces de remplissage de formulaires".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ձևաթղթերի լրացման սենյակներում" (devaqtxerí lrats'man senyak'nerum) translates to 'in form filling rooms' but could be more accurately translated as 'rooms where forms are filled' or 'form processing rooms' to better reflect the intended meaning. The current wording is somewhat literal and sounds slightly awkward in Armenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Հավաքեք ավարտված ձևի պատճենները և տվյալները XLSX-ում՝ ձևանմուշների մշակման սենյակներում (havageq avartvad deví patchennere yev tvalyanere XLSX-um - devanmusheni mshakman senyaknerum): This translates to 'Collect the completed form copies and data into XLSX for form processing rooms.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "stanze di Compilazione modulo" is grammatically awkward. "Compilazione" is a noun, and while understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: stanze dedicate alla compilazione dei moduli

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Form Filling rooms" implies a dedicated space where forms are being filled out. The Italian translation doesn't convey this. A more literal translation, but perhaps less accurate, would be 'stanze di compilazione moduli'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: stanze dedicate all'inserimento dei dati dei moduli

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation uses a slightly less formal tone than the English. 'フォーム記入ルーム' (Form Filling rooms) sounds a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing might be 'フォーム回答分析ルーム' or something similar depending on the specific room function.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing 'フォーム記入ルーム' to something more natural like 'フォーム回答分析ルーム' or a more contextually appropriate term.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation uses a full stop at the end of the sentence. While grammatically correct, it might be more appropriate to omit it for a more natural flow in technical documentation or instructions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the full stop at the end: 완료된 서식 사본과 데이터를 XLSX 형식으로 수집하여 Form Filling 룸에서 응답을 분석합니다

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ສຶ້ອກວດວິເຄາະ" (seuk-gwaet-wi-keo) is a bit clunky and overly formal for describing analyzing responses. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'ວິເຄາະ' (wi-keo) or 'ກວດແກ້' (gwaet-gae).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ວິເຄາະການຕອບສະໜອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the word order might be improved for a more fluent Lao reading experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເກັບຮັກສາແບບຟອມທີ່ສໍາເລັດຮູບ ແລະ ຂໍ້ມູນຈາກມັນໃສ່ໃນໄຟລ໌ XLSX ເພື່ອວິເຄາະການຕອບສະໜອງໃນຫ້ອງຕື່ມແບບຟອມ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "veidlapu aizpildīšanas telpās" is a bit awkward. It literally translates to 'form filling rooms'. A more natural translation for 'Form Filling rooms' in this context would be something like 'atbildžu apstrādes telpās' (response processing rooms) or simply 'telpās' (rooms).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aizpildīto veidlapu kopiju un no tām iegūto datu apkopošana XLSX, lai analizētu atbildes atbildžu apstrādes telpās.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, adding a comma after 'XLSX' might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aizpildīto veidlapu kopiju un no tām iegūto datu apkopošana XLSX, , lai analizētu atbildes veidlapu aizpildīšanas telpās.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "geëxtraheerde gegevens" (extracted data) is a bit stiff and not the most natural way to describe pulling data from forms. It implies a complex extraction process that may not be necessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verzamelen van kopieën van de ingevulde formulieren en de gegevens uit deze formulieren in XLSX om de antwoorden in de formulierenkamers te analyseren.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using 'uit deze formulieren' instead of 'uit de formulieren' improves flow and readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verzamelen van kopieën van de ingevulde formulieren en de gegevens uit deze formulieren in XLSX om de antwoorden in de formulierenkamers te analyseren.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "form filling rooms" is a somewhat literal translation and might not be the most natural way to describe the context in Polish. A more appropriate term might convey a space dedicated to processing and analyzing form data.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a term like "pomieszczeniach do przetwarzania formularzy" (rooms for processing forms) or "stanowiskach analitycznych" (analysis workstations).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'salas de Preenchimento de Formulários' is a literal translation of 'Form Filling rooms'. While understandable, a more natural phrasing in Brazilian Portuguese would improve readability. Consider using a more descriptive term or rephrasing the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: salas de preenchimento de formulários or salas de análise de respostas (depending on the exact context)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "în formularul XLSX" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'into XLSX'. It suggests saving the data *into* a form, rather than creating an XLSX file *from* the data.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: în fișierul XLSX

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'formularul' is not the best translation for 'form'.  'Formular' is more appropriate in this context, referring to a physical form or document.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: în fișierul XLSX pentru a analiza răspunsurile în săli de Completare a formularelor

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Комнатах для заполнения форм' lacks an article. It should ideally have one to sound more natural in Russian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Собирайте копии заполненных форм и данные из них в формате XLSX для анализа ответов в комнатах для заполнения форм.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Form Filling rooms' is awkwardly translated as 'පෝම් ෆිලිං කුම'. A more accurate translation would be 'පෝම් පුරවිං phòng' (Form Filling rooms) or a descriptive equivalent like 'පෝම් පුරවිං phòng වල' (in Form Filling rooms).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පෝම් පුරවිං phòng වල

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ෆයිල්‍යක්' (file) is not the most natural Sinhala phrasing for a file format. While understandable, 'ෆයිල්' would be more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ෆයිල්

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Form Filling rooms" is not directly equivalent to "miestnostiach na vyplňovanie formulárov". While understandable, it's a bit clunky and literal. A more natural Slovak rendering might be "miestnostiach pre vyplňovanie formulárov" or simply "pracovniach".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: miestnostiach pre vyplňovanie formulárov

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Прикупите' (Prikuпите) which translates to 'acquire' or 'collect', doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Collect'. A more accurate translation would be something like 'Сада' (Sada) which means 'gather' or 'collect'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Сада попуњене копије обрасца и податке из њих у XLSX формату за анализу одговора у просторијама за попуњавање образаца.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'просторијама за попуњавање образаца' (prostorijama za popunjavanje obrazaca) while technically correct, is a bit verbose and less common. A more natural phrasing would be 'у просторијама за попуњавање формулара' or 'у просторијама за попуњавање образаца'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: у просторијама за попуњавање образаца.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'u XLSX formatu' could be improved for clarity and flow. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: u XLSX datoteci

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'prostorijama za popunjavanje obrazaca' translates to 'form filling rooms', it's a very literal and slightly awkward translation.  A more natural phrasing might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: u kancelarijama za obradu formulara

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Collect the completed form copies" is not accurately reflected in the Turkish translation "doldurulan form kopyalarını". While "doldurulan" implies 'filled/completed', the action of 'collecting' is missing. A more accurate translation would include a verb for collecting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Toplanan doldurulan form kopyalarını...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "for analyzing responses" is a bit clunky in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: yanıtları analiz etmek için

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Form Filling rooms' is translated as 'phòng Điền Mẫu'. While understandable, a more accurate and natural translation would be 'phòng điền đơn' or 'phòng làm mẫu'. The current translation feels somewhat literal and awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: phòng điền đơn

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Form Filling rooms" is translated as "表单填写房间". While technically correct, a more natural and common phrasing in Chinese might be "问卷填写房间" (wenjuan tiánxiě fángjiān) or "调查问卷填写房间" (diàochá wènjuàn tiánxiě fángjiān) as 'Form Filling' often refers to survey or questionnaire filling.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 将“表单填写房间”改为“问卷填写房间”或“调查问卷填写房间”。
